verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Within the Father's house The Son hath found His home; And to His temple suddenly The Lord of Life hath come.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The doctors of the law Gaze on the wondrous child, And marvel at His gracious words Of wisdom undefiled.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Yet not to them is giv'n The mighty truth to know, To lift the fleshly veil which hides Incarnate God below.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: The secret of the Lord Escapes each human eye, And faithful pond'ring hearts await The full epiphany.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Lord, vis-it Thou our souls, And teach us by Thy grace Each dim revealing of Thyself With loving awe to trace;

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Till from our darkened sight
The cloud shall pass away,
And on the cleansèd soul shall burst
The everlasting day.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Till we behold Thy face,
And know, as we are known,
Thee, Father, Son, and Holy Ghost,
Co-equal Three in One.
